message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair starting point!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
Let's split it 50-50, a fair and equal split!
You're getting desperate, I'll take a small share
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect much more!
You're getting low, I'll take almost all
I'll give you a decent share, but don't expect much more!
You're running out of time, I'll take most of the scraps
I'll give you most of the remaining money, but I'm not going down without a fight!
